extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 3 and 6.0 units at the 200 level in RELS.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from RELS 353/6.0; RELS 354/3.0; RELS 355/3.0.

basic.description: An introduction to major theoretical approaches to the study of religion.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Theory in Religious Studies
